```{r, include=FALSE}
load("../../Data/Temp/Raw_data_2.Rda")
lc.wholesale <- data %>% filter(Portfolio_lv1 == "Wholesale") 
lc.wholesale <- Lc(lc.wholesale$PD,lc.wholesale$EAD*lc.wholesale$LGD)

lc.retail <- data %>% filter(Portfolio_lv1 == "Retail") 
lc.retail <- Lc(lc.retail$PD,lc.retail$EAD*lc.retail$LGD)
```



- Average Capital savings using $\hat{P}$ and LGD original distribution: 32.8% 

- Average Gini coefficient $PD$ weighted by $LGD$: 0.67

- Correlation between Gini coefficient and capital savings: 0.79


- $\hat{P}=\frac{\sum_i^nEAD_iLGD_iPD_i}{\sum_i^nEAD_iLGD_i}$ \newline
